00021 SoundManager::SoundManager(GameManager* gameManager)
00022 {
00023     m_gameManager = gameManager;
00024 
00025     m_fmodsys = m_gameManager->manager.fmodsys;
00026 
00027     map<string, string> soundPaths;
00028 
00029     soundPaths["boost"] = "data/sfxart/boost.wav";
00030     soundPaths["stop"] = "data/sfxart/stop.wav";
00031     soundPaths["bullettime"] = "data/sfxart/bullettime.wav";
00032     soundPaths["hit"] = "data/sfxart/hit.wav";
00033     soundPaths["jumper"] = "data/sfxart/jumper.wav";
00034     soundPaths["kill"] = "data/sfxart/kill.wav";
00035     soundPaths["noAvailable"] = "data/sfxart/noAvailable.wav";
00036     soundPaths["notime"] = "data/sfxart/notime.wav";
00037     soundPaths["respawn"] = "data/sfxart/respawn.wav";
00038     soundPaths["takeammo"] = "data/sfxart/takeammo.wav";
00039     soundPaths["takefatalshot"] = "data/sfxart/takefatalshot.wav";
00040     soundPaths["takelife"] = "data/sfxart/takelife.wav";
00041     soundPaths["takesuperlife"] = "data/sfxart/takesuperlife.wav";
00042     soundPaths["teleport"] = "data/sfxart/teleport.wav";
00043 
00044     for(map<string, string>::iterator it = soundPaths.begin(); it != soundPaths.end(); it++)
00045         RegisterSound(it->first, it->second);
00046 }

00052 void SoundManager::RegisterSound(std::string name, std::string filename)
00053 {
00054     if(!m_gameManager->manager.app->globalSettings.noaudio)
00055     {
00056         if(m_sounds.count(name))
00057         {
00058             cout << "Load shared sound : " << filename << endl;
00059             return;
00060         }
00061 
00062         cout << "Load sound : " << filename << endl;
00063 
00064         FMOD_RESULT res = FMOD_System_CreateSound(m_fmodsys, filename.c_str(),
00065                                                   FMOD_LOOP_OFF | FMOD_3D | FMOD_HARDWARE,
00066                                                   0, &m_sounds[name]);
00067 
00068         if(res != FMOD_OK)
00069             throw tbe::Exception("SoundManager::RegisterSound; %s (%s)",
00070                                  FMOD_ErrorString(res), filename.c_str());
00071         else
00072             FMOD_Sound_Set3DMinMaxDistance(m_sounds[name], 8, 128);
00073     }
00074 }
00075 
00076 void SoundManager::Play(std::string soundName, Object* object)
00077 {
00078     #if !defined(THEBALL_DISABLE_SOUND) && !defined(THEBALL_NO_AUDIO)
00079     FMOD_CHANNEL* channel;
00080 
00081     FMOD_System_PlaySound(m_fmodsys, FMOD_CHANNEL_FREE, m_sounds[soundName], true, &channel);
00082 
00083     FMOD_Channel_Set3DAttributes(channel,
00084                                  (FMOD_VECTOR*)(float*)object->GetPos(),
00085                                  (FMOD_VECTOR*)(float*)object->GetPhysicBody()->GetVelocity());
00086 
00087     ProcessEffect(soundName, channel);
00088 
00089     FMOD_Channel_SetPaused(channel, false);
00090     #endif
00091 }
